item.title: Add Mindee - OCR API Platform
item.description: https://developers.mindee.com/docs - Mindee is a powerful OCR software and an API-first platform that helps developers automate applications' workflows by standardizing the document processing layer through data recognition for key information using computer vision and machine learning. The free tier offers 250 pages per month.

item.title: Added SVGmix.com
item.description: https://www.svgmix.com/ - Massive repository of 300K+ of free SVG icons, collections, and brand logos. It has a simple vector editing program right in the browser for quick file editing.

item.title: Move Resend to be in alphabetical order
item.description:
https://embrace.io/ - Mobile app monitoring. Free for small teams with up to 1 million user sessions per year.
https://resend.com - Transactional emails API for developers. 3,000 emails/month, 100 emails/day free, one custom domain.
https://form2channel.com - Send form submissions to Google Sheets, Email, Email, Slack, Telegram or Webhooks. Unlimited and free. Features include multiple recipients, custom thank-you pages, file uploads, and more.

item.title: Add bleemeo.com in monitoring section
item.description: https://bleemeo.com - Free for 3 servers, 5 uptime monitors, unlimited users, unlimited dashboards, unlimited alerting rules.

item.title: Add Flightcontrol to the PaaS section
item.description: https://flightcontrol.dev/ - Deploy web services, databases, and more on your own AWS account with a Git push style workflow. Free tier for users with 1 developer on personal GitHub repos. AWS costs are billed through AWS, but you can use credits and the AWS free tier.

item.title: typo
item.description: https://pagecrawl.io/ - Monitor website changes, free for up to 6 monitors with daily checks.

item.title: Add PageCrawl.io
item.description: https://pagecrawl.io/ - Monitor website changes, free for up to 5 monitors with daily checks.

item.title: added fxratesapi.com
item.description: https://fxratesapi.com - Provides real-time and historical exchange rates. The free tier requires attribution.

item.title: Education and Career Development
item.description:
https://www.freecodecamp.org/ - Free and Open Source Career Development. Certificates in Data Analysis, InfoSec, Web Development, and more.
https://ladderly.io/ - Free and Open Source Career Development. Includes a social network and job search tools.
https://www.theodinproject.com/ - Project](https://www.theodinproject.com/) - Free and Open Source Career Development. Focus on JavaScript and Ruby.
